lead_paragraph: National Basketball Association owners have approved the tentative collective bargaining agreement reached with the players' union last week and await a ratification vote by the players, according to media reports.

headline.print_headline: Labor Deal 'Could Be Sealed by Christmas'
headline.main: Labor Deal 'Could Be Sealed by Christmas'
